rules.fullName: 24 Hrs Notification to TM for India Distributor SO
rules.description: It used to notify India TM when Distributor order is created and not approved by TM within 24 hrs

rules.fullName: 24 Hrs Notification to ZSM for India Distributor SO
rules.description: It used to notify India ZSM when Distributor order is created and not approved by ZSM within 24 hrs

rules.fullName: 48 Hrs Notification to TM %26 Distributor for India SO
rules.description: It used to notify India TM & Distributor when Distributor order is created and not approved by TM within 48 hrs

rules.fullName: 48 Hrs Notification to ZSM %26 Distributor for India SO

rules.fullName: Brazil Child Sales Order
Brazil Order Rejection by SAP
rules.description: Order Rejection by SAP – Status (Error from SAP, Rejected)

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 1
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SDM (if Sales Office Manager is present)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', CreatedById = SalesDistrictManager__c, OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director')), NOT( ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c ) ) )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 10
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO (Barter) created by SP/Key Seller & approved by SDM & Sales Office Manager is present
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c == 'W', OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending for manager approval'), NOT(ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c )), ApprovedBySDM__c == TRUE, Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1 )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 11
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales District Manager is not present & Flag > 1
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c), Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager')) )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 12
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales District Manager is present, AP: flag logic (Flag > 1) & Bonif/Punct.
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', OR(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO'),Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1), OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), NOT(ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c)), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')))

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 13
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales District Manager is present & Barter Order
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c = 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), NOT(ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c )), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending By Barter Manager'), ApprovedByBM__c == TRUE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 14
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales District Manager is not present & Barter Order (approved by BM)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c = 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c ), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending By Barter Manager'), ApprovedByBM__c == TRUE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 15
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales District Manager is not present & Barter Order (on submit - not approved by BM yet)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c = 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected By Barter Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')), ApprovedByBM__c == FALSE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 16
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales District Manager is present & Barter Order (on submit-not approved by BM yet)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c = 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), NOT(ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c )), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected By Barter Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')), ApprovedByBM__c == FALSE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 17
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order: to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales Office Manager is present/not present, Not Barter Order & submitted/re-submitted
rules.formula: OR(AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), NOT(ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c)), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')) ), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')) ), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c == 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), OR(ISPICKVAL(OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager')), NOT(ISBLANK(SalesDistrictManager__c)), ApprovedBySDM__c == FALSE ), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 0, NOT (ISBLANK(SalesDistrictManager__c ) ), CreatedById = SalesDistrictManager__c, OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager')) ) )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 18
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order: to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales Office Manager is present/not present, Barter Order & submitted/re-submitted
rules.formula: OR(AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c = 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), NOT(ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c)), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected By Barter Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')) ), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c = 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected By Barter Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')) ))

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 19
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, if Sales Office Manager is not present & Barter Order (Approved by BM)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c = 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected By Barter Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending By Barter Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')), ApprovedByBM__c == TRUE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 2
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SDM (if Sales Office Manager is not present), Flag = 3 & SD <> Null
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', CreatedById = SalesDistrictManager__c, ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft'), ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c ), Approval_Flag_Count__c = 3, NOT(ISBLANK(SalesDirector__c)) )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 20
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order: to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SDM, Sales Office Manager is present & Approved By SOM, flag = 3
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', CreatedById = SalesDistrictManager__c, ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending at Sales Office Manager'), ApprovedBySOM__c == TRUE, Approval_Flag_Count__c = 3, NOT( ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c ) ) )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 21
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SDM, Barter Order, flag count 3 & all managers are present in hierarchy (on submit)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c = 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1, CreatedById = SalesDistrictManager__c, NOT(ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c )), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected By Barter Manager'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')), ApprovedByBM__c == FALSE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 22
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller, SDM = NULL, Flag = 1, SOM = Present & Approved by SOM
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', Approval_Flag_Count__c == 1, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISBLANK( SalesDistrictManager__c), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending at Sales Office Manager'), NOT(ISBLANK(SalesOfficeManager__c)), ApprovedBySOMifSDMisNull__c == TRUE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 3
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller & approved by SDM but Sales Office Manager is not present
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending for manager approval'), ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c ), ApprovedBySDM__c == TRUE, Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1 )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 4
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller & approved by SDM & Sales Office Manager is present OR created by SP, SDM = NULL, Flag Count = 1 & SOM is present
rules.formula: OR(AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 1, OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by Sales Office Manager')), ISBLANK(SalesDistrictManager__c), NOT(ISBLANK(SalesOfficeManager__c))), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending for manager approval'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending By Barter Manager')), NOT(ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c )), ApprovedBySDM__c == TRUE, Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1) )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 5
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller & approved by SDM (Approval Flag 1)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), PaymentMethod__r.Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO')), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending for manager approval'), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 1, ApprovedBySDM__c == TRUE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 6
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller & approved by SOM (Approval Flag 2)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), PaymentMethod__r.Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO')), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending at Sales Office Manager'), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 2, ApprovedBySOM__c == TRUE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 7
rules.description: To set Order Sub Status when SO created by SP/Key Seller & approved by SOM (Flag 3) OR created by SP/Key Seller, Flag 1,SDM = Null, SOM = Null OR Created by SP/Key Seller, Flag 2, SOM = Null (Approved by SDM) OR Created by SDM, SOM = Null, Flag = 2
rules.formula: OR( AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), PaymentMethod__r.Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO')), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending at Sales Office Manager'), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 3, ApprovedBySOM__c == TRUE ), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), PaymentMethod__r.Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO')), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft'), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Rejected by director')), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 1, ISBLANK(SalesDistrictManager__c), ISBLANK(SalesOfficeManager__c) ), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), PaymentMethod__r.Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO')), OR(ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending for manager approval')), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 2, NOT(ISBLANK(SalesDistrictManager__c)), ApprovedBySDM__c == TRUE, ISBLANK(SalesOfficeManager__c) ), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, CreatedById = SalesDistrictManager__c, PaymentMethod__r.Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO')), OR(ISPICKVAL(OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 2, ISBLANK(SalesOfficeManager__c) ), AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), PaymentMethod__r.Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO')), OR(ISPICKVAL(OrderSubStatus__c ,'Draft')), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 2, ISBLANK(SalesDistrictManager__c), ISBLANK(SalesOfficeManager__c) ) )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 8
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO created by SOM & approved by SDM (Approval Flag 3)
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, CreatedById = SalesOfficeManager__c, PaymentMethod__r.Payment_Method_Code__c <> 'W', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Order__c, 'BONIFICAÇÃO')), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending for manager approval'), Approval_Flag_Count__c == 3, ApprovedBySDM__c == TRUE )

rules.fullName: Brazil SO Set Order Sub Status 9
rules.description: Used for Brazil Sales Order : to set Order Sub Status when SO (Barter) created by SP/Key Seller & approved by SDM but Sales Office Manager is not present
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c == '5191', BrazilOrderSubmittedforApproval__c == TRUE, Payment_Method_Code__c == 'W', OR(CreatedById = OwnerId, Key_Account__c == TRUE), ISPICKVAL( OrderSubStatus__c ,'Pending for manager approval'), ISBLANK( SalesOfficeManager__c ), ApprovedBySDM__c == TRUE, Approval_Flag_Count__c > 1 )

rules.fullName: Brazil Sales Order Rejection Email Alert
rules.description: Fired when Order Status is 'Rejected' and Sales Org = 'Brazil' and Remarks for Cancellation is blank - Added by Bhavik

rules.fullName: CAM-Email notification to higher authorities for every order placed%28SAP%29
rules.description: The user who will being receiving the orders in SAP, has to get a notification for every order placed.
rules.formula: AND(OR(SalesOrgCode__c='5320',SalesOrgCode__c='5310'),ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c,"Not yet processed"),NOT(ISBLANK(SAP_Order_Number__c)),ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(SAP_Order_Number__c)))

rules.fullName: Depot Code for Sales Order
rules.formula: true

rules.fullName: Indonesia Order Creation Notification
rules.description: Notify user 'Sagin Suseno' when new sales order is created for Indonesia

rules.fullName: Italy Email Alert for I77 - I31
rules.description: Created for SCTASK0399921

rules.fullName: Italy Return Order Status Change
Notification to all on Order Cancellation
Notification to all on Order Creation
rules.formula: true

rules.fullName: Notification to all on Order Processed
Poland Total Amount Update
Share Community Orders with Pradip Dhoka
Update Approval Flag Brazil
Update Order Status to pending
rules.description: This workflow updates the Order Status field to "Pending" only for Argentina

rules.fullName: Update PO Number Field for Turkey
rules.formula: AND(SalesOrgCode__c = '7110', ISBLANK( PONumber__c ), ISPICKVAL( CreatedFrom__c , 'SFDC') )

rules.fullName: Update Region Code and Name for Brazil
Update SFDC No Field
rules.formula: true

rules.fullName: Update Sales Order
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( Net_Amount__c )

rules.fullName: Updating %22Created from %22 field for Sap Orders
rules.formula: AND(OR(SalesOrgCode__c == '1000' , SalesOrgCode__c == '1210', SalesOrgCode__c == '1510'), $User.ProfileId == '00e28000000EyZ8')
